name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-reaction-java
title: Message Reaction in Messaging Extension using Bot Framework v4
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates how to use message reactions in Microsoft Teams with a bot built on the Bot Framework.
longDescription: This sample bot, built on the Bot Framework, responds to message reactions in Microsoft Teams. It showcases features such as adaptive cards and supports multiple scopes, including personal, group, and team interactions.
